page.title: 20CHANGES in RHAYADER
page.content: This project was compiled by members of{Rhayader Women's Institute,}each page being researched and written by a different member. The building of the Brynberth Industrial Estate brought light industry into what was formerly a community of farmers and shopkeepers. This caused an expansion in both private and council house building and the consequent immigration of people from more industrial areas. Another pattern is now emerging of people purchasing property in the area with a view to retirement,thus bringing people with a more varied background.This is highlighted by the membership of our Women's Institute which now has members who came originally from many different parts of the country.
